summary:
Stake and earn with your favorite Blockchains - Liquid Stake to earn rewards real time

 Use stkASSETS in DeFi protocols for rewards - 

 Yield Farm to leverage stkASSETS - 

 Cosmos Hub (ATOM) - Liquid Stake your ATOM directly or staked ATOM through LSM to get the best of both worlds –Staking and DeFi

 Binance Smart Chain (BNB) - Liquid Stake BNB to get the best of both worlds — Staking & DeFi.

 Ethereum (ETH) - Natively liquid stake ETH on Ethereum and supported L2s — Arbitrum & Optimism.
